sourcesContent:
import * as React from 'react' import Play from '../../assets/PlayButton.svg' import Plus from '../../assets/PlusButton.svg' import { Track } from '../../types' interface TrackCardProps { track: Track } function msToHMS (ms: number) { let seconds = ms / 1000 seconds = seconds % 3600 const minutes = seconds / 60 seconds = seconds % 60 return minutes + ':' + seconds } export default function TrackCard ({ track }: TrackCardProps) { return (

{track.name}

{track.artists.map(e => { if (track.artists.indexOf(e) !== track.artists.length - 1) { return e + ', ' } return e })}

) }
